name: PEPELOCO
description: PEPELOCO is a decentralized, community-driven meme project built on the Solana blockchain. Inspired by cultural humor and borderless ambition, PEPELOCO represents financial freedom without limits. The project’s roadmap includes NFT collections, staking options, liquidity pools with other Pepe projects, consistent buybacks, and major exchange listings—uniting global holders through laughter, culture, and crypto innovation.
